slts.slt: I can mint an Andamio Access Token.
I can view the global state of my access token.
I know the roles that can participants can take in Andamio.
I can use my access token to enroll in a Course on Andamio.
I can commit to an Assignment.
I understand how Courses, Modules, and Student Learning Targets are organized in Andamio.
I know Assignments are used Andamio PBL.
I can submit evidence for an Assignment.
I can say hello in Discord / leave a comment / fill out a form.

modules.title: Contribution and Treasury Management in Andamio

slts.slt: I can mint a Contributor Token in Andamio.
I can commit to a Project in Andamio.
I can receive rewards for completing a Project.
I can view my record of completed Projects.

modules.title: How to Create a Course in Andamio

slts.slt: I can create a new Course in the Andamio Course Management portal.
I can create a new Module in an Andamio PBL Course.
I can write Student Learning Targets for a Course Module.
I can create an Assignment that provides evidence of student learning.
I can write Lessons for Student Learning Target in a Module.
I can publish a PBL Course in Andamio.

modules.title: How to Create a Contributor Treasury

slts.slt: I can initialize a Contributor Treasury.
I can add funds to the treasury.
I can list projects in the treasury.
I can assign Reviewers to a treasury instance.

modules.title: How to Create a Contributor Treasury

slts.slt: I can view prerequisites for Learners and Contributors in Andamio
As a Course Creator, I can add a prerequisite to a Course Module.
As a Treasury Administrator, I can add a prerequisite to a Project.
